homePage.sectionOneContentA: Protect your privacy with Jumping Spider's global VPN service.With fast connection speeds and servers in multiple countries,
homePage.sectionOneContentB: you can access any content anytime, anywhere.
homePage.sectionTwoContentA: Just pay the monthly fee easily and you can have high-quality URL connection VPN service.
homePage.sectionTwoContentB: Enterprise users also enjoy customized services, allowing them to freely connect via VPN using URLs or credentials to create a unique network environment.
homePage.sectionThreeContent: Install OpenVPN and enter the URL or credentials provided by Jumping Spider to open a secure connection channel locally, easily connect to the device, and explore the endless wonders of the virtual network.
homePage.sectionFourContentB: and establish a stable connection instantly.
homePage.sectionFourContentC: The certificate allows you to direct the VPN connection to the specified device,
homePage.sectionFiveSub: Enjoy an efficient and secure VPN connection
homePage.sectionFiveContent: Subscribe to Jumping Spider VPN now to create your own secure channel and experience new online freedom.

pricePage.description: Jumping Spider VPN provides comprehensive customized services for enterprises, safe and stable. Unified management, undifferentiated price strategy, the best VPN solution.
pricePage.featureThree: Virtual network experience without regional restrictions
pricePage.reminder: After the confirmation is completed, you can go to the OpneVPN connection information in the member center to check.
pricePage.failed: Payment Fail. Please confirm whether there is insufficient virtual currency balance or platform technical issues.

faqPage.questionOne: How to install and configure OpenVPN？
faqPage.questionTwo: Connection often disconnects when using Jumping Spider？
faqPage.questionThree: What is the difference between URL and credentials？
faqPage.questionFour: How to use Jumping Spider VPN simultaneously on different devices？
faqPage.answerOne: We have a detailed installation guide that you can find at [OpenVPN Tutorial] with clear and concise steps. If you need further assistance, please feel free to contact us and our customer service team will be happy to help you complete the setup.
faqPage.answerTwo: Please make sure you are using the correct URL or credentials and check with our connectivity troubleshooting guide. If the problem still exists, please contact our customer service immediately and we will help you solve the problem as soon as possible.
faqPage.answerThree: URL mode establishes a fixed connection after the initial random connection to ensure stable connection quality. The certificate mode provides VPN connection to the designated resource sharer SDN, providing more control. If you still have questions, our customer service is always available to explain and assist.
faqPage.answerFour: Jumping Spider supports account synchronization. You only need to use the same account to log in to different devices, and you can easily synchronize it across devices. If you encounter problems during operation, our customer service will provide assistance at any time.

memberInfoPage.expired: Not subscribed to VPN service / Subscription has expired
